ygData.subject: Re: Mystic Cloak Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: i know you WERE able to sometimes (glowing stein comes to mind) but i think if you are KOS to them it will break the invis.  im not sure if this was a feature
ygData.messageBody:
i know you WERE able to sometimes (glowing stein comes to mind) but i think
if you are KOS to them it will break the invis. im not sure if this was a
feature or a bug. for example, in the glowing stein you had to talk to the
bartender. i wasnt kos to him, but the ogre paladin in the bar did enjoy
killing me (several times, actually). also, he could see invis (i suppose
all ogre paladins can see invis...) so it made this rather difficult to
complete. the crucial fact, if you turned the book into the ogre barkeep in
ogguk while not invis, you wont complete the quest (he doesnt like dark
elves enough). but you could have done it while invis (cons indifferent).

i do know for a fact that if you are kos to them, they will attack- i tried
some minor quests to test this out a while ago (the muffin quest in freeport
for example)

belphenor


>From: Gabriel Kang <chaotic@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Mystic Cloak Quest
>Date: Wed, 03 Nov 1999 14:37:39 +0800
>
>hi !
>
>I heard from some sources (not sure where since i already deleted the mail)
>that
>quests are able to be completed while under Invisibility .
>
>They stated examples by completing the Mystic Cloak quest
>(8ac +5int +5sv magic 10 charges SteelSkin) .
>
>A few days later i attempted to try this out myself by camping
>the Priest of Najena in Unrest . It was a 52 min spawn and more
>often than not spawns a regular Ghoul as a placeholder (PH).
>
>After 16 long hours of waiting in line (only 2 spawned) and getting
>the component off the Priest i made off to Najena to complete part
>1 of the quest . unfortunately when i tried to give it to the NPC while
>invis , it broke the invisibility and i was charmed and killed by the NPC
>(who is a High Elf Enchanter btw) .
>
>Has anybody else attempted to complete this quest ?
>or does anyone have confirmation if quests can be completed
>while invis ? pls email me directly as I dont always get the time
>to read all this list mails...
>
>regards,
>
>KAEN
>Necromancer of the 30th circle
>on Erollisi Marr .
>
>
